exportFormats.name: Zotero Import
exportFormats.outputPathTemplate: 05 Zotero/{% if creators.length > 2 %}{{creators[0].lastName}} et al{% elif creators.length == 2 %}{%- for creator in creators %}{{creator.firstName}} {{creator.lastName}}{% if not loop.last %}, {% endif %}{%- endfor %}{% else %}{{authors}}{% endif %} - {{title | replace(":", "") | replace("?", "") | replace("\"", "'") | replace("/", "_") | replace("\\", "_") | replace("|", "_")}} {% if date %}({{date | format("YYYY")}}){% endif %}.md
